product_name: Patagonia Piton Hybrid Fleece Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The most durable, wind-resistant fleece in the Patagonia lineup, the women's Piton Hybrid Fleece Jacket features a trim design that excels on hikes, cross-country ski trails or uphill skinning. Flexible hybrid design lets you wear the jacket as an outer layer until it really gets cold and it's time for a full-on shell. Durable Polartec(R) Wind Pro(R) fabric forms the elbows, chest, shoulders, top of hood and upper-back. Hardface(R) technology and a durable water repellent finish protects your front torso and elbows from wind, moisture and abrasion. Back and side panels are super breathable, stretchy and wicking Polartec Power Dry(R) fabric with high recycled content. Warm brushed-fleece interior moves moisture quickly to the fabric face. Microfleece-lined collar, chin guard; stretchy binding on cuffs and hem. Zippered handwarmer pockets are pack- and harness-friendly. The women's Piton Hybrid Fleece Jacket has seamless shoulders comfort under a backpack. Closeout.
short_description: The most durable, wind-resistant fleece in the Patagonia lineup, the women's Piton Hybrid Fleece Jacket features a trim design that excels on hikes, cross-country ski trails or uphill skinning.
